Package design.aeonic.nifty.api.client.screen.input

Interface Gizmo

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGizmo, ButtonGizmo, CheckboxGizmo, FluidStackGizmo, IntGizmo, RedstoneGizmo, SettingsGizmo, StringGizmo, TabsGizmo
public interface Gizmo
Simplified input widget system used for node rendering and other GUIs.
